nodes.text: A travois was a primitive vehicle used for transporting people and objects. It functioned by being dragged along the ground behind whatever was towing it. After Apprentice Legislator Harp Allor injured her ankle during a pathfinding class on Alderaan, Princess Leia Organa and the other members of the class built a travois to transport her.
A travois first appeared in canon in the 2017 novel Leia, Princess of Alderaan. It was first pictured in the novel's manga adaptation Leia Organa: Ordeal of the Princess.
